outputs.output_descr: This project will focus on the review of the National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plan in Botswana (NBSAP) as part of the support to implementing the CDB strategic plan. It is an enabling activity for biodiversity conservation planning and management.

project_descr: Purpose: Identify priority actions and inform preparation of the Full Sized Project on: Improved Management Effectiveness of the Chobe-Kwando-Linyanti (CKL) Matrix of Protected Areas.
